title: Best of The Herd for Oct 06, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Oct 06, 2020
description:
-Aaron Rodgers has clearly won the divorce with mike McCarthy

-Cam Newton's value was on display Monday night

-The Cowboys need to admit their mistake and get rid of their defensive coordinator

-Russell Wilson is better than Patrick Mahomes right now

-The Herd Hierarchy: Colin's top ten teams in the NFL


Guest: Andrew Whitworth, Rams Offensive Lineman

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
